title: [Gameplay] Full Metal Jayce uses Classic skin's voice
body:
So I started playing Jayce again after the Preseason update and selected his Full Metal Skin. The skin usually filters his voice to have a deep, mechanical sound to it, but all my resent games with him using this skin had him talking in his default skin's voice. Has anyone else been having audio bugs like this?
Again, it's for a skin that filters the default skin's lines, not replacing it with other lines like Legendary skins.

replies.body:
Hey Cyber Guy v302,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and it should be resolved shortly.
